intro: This wikiHow teaches you how to play Minesweeper on a Windows computer. Although Minesweeper no longer comes pre-installed on Windows computers, you can download the remastered version from the Windows 10 Store for free.

steps.title: Clear the board.
steps.subtitle: To win a round of Minesweeper, you must click on the board every square that doesn't have a mine under it. Once you've done so, the game will be over.
sub-points: If you accidentally click a square that has a mine beneath it, the game will be over. You'll have the option of starting a new game or redoing the one you just played.
